TWinSparkle Methods

Methods
 NameDescription
CheckUpdate(TUpdateType)

Calls the appropriate check update method depending on the updateType.

CheckUpdateWithoutUI

Doesn't show the window with the release notes. It just downloads the file and executes it.

CheckUpdateWithUI

Show a window with release notes and provides choices before downloading the updates.

CheckUpdateWithUIandInstall

Same as CheckUpdateWithUI but installs automatically the downloaded file.

Cleanup

Represents method Cleanup.

Init

Initialises WinSparkle.

ResetUpdateCheckInterval

Resets the check interval to the default value (86400 secs)

SetAppDetails(string,string,string)

Sets the application details.

SetLang(string)

Sets the language of the UI.

SetLangID(ShortInt)

Sets the language using the LanguageID.

Top
